snippet.title: Child hit by car at front of Coast school
snippet.content:
BREAKING: A CHILD has been taken to hospital after being hit by a car while leaving school.
The 10-year-old boy was struck out the front of Buddina State School about 3pm this afternoon and was taken to hospital with minor injuries.
Two ambulance crews were on scene to transport the boy to Sunshine Coast University Hospital.
No details are available about the driver at this stage.
More to come.
